manifest.title: Ollama
manifest.author: Ollama
manifest.description:
### About

Get up and running with large language models: OpenAI gpt-oss, DeepSeek-R1, Gemma 3 and other models.

api-key.message: Ollama API is secured with an API key, generated at the first run and stored in `/app/data/.api_key`. Use [File Manager](/filemanager.html?type=app&id=$CLOUDRON-APP-ID) to change it

manifest.changelog:
* Update ollama to 0.15.6
* [Full Changelog](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/releases/tag/v0.15.6)
* Fixed context limits when running `ollama launch droid`
* `ollama launch` will now download missing models instead of erroring
* Fixed bug where `ollama launch claude` would cause context compaction when providing images
